DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate safety and immunogenicity of three influenza vaccines in children ages greater than 4 years old to less than 18 years old.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Immunogenicity of Three Influenza Vaccines in Children Aged 4 Years Old to Less Than 18 Years Old
DOC.criteria: 1. Male or female aged 4 years to less than 18 years of age. 2. Individual who had a parent or guardian who could give written informed consent after understanding the nature of the study and comply with study procedures and were available for followup. 3. If the individual was of an age where, according to local regulations, informed assent is required, that individual had provided assent to participate in the study. 1. Individuals recently vaccinated against influenza 2. Subjects with contraindications to receive influenza vaccine
